title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2 and KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), it is observed that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect. This issue is particularly misleading when opening a small image, such as an icon, as the scrollbars give the impression of functionality when they do not actually do anything.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled to prevent confusion and misleading behavior.
SR: Update the code of the ImageAnalyzer example to disable the scrollbars.
